crick.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a pain in the muscles in your neck or back that is caused by the muscles becoming stiff
crick.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He was getting a crick in his neck from leaning out of the window for so long.
crick.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to hurt your back or neck by bending or moving in a way that makes the muscles become stiff
crick.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: I cricked my back bending to pick up the suitcase.
